SELECT 't1' as teamNo, '直属会员' as teamName, IFNULL(sum(F_PAY_PRICE), 0) as payPrice, IFNULL(sum(F_CARD_GOLD), 0) as cardGold, IFNULL(sum(F_PAY_PRICE) * #{params.t1}, 0) as commission FROM t_sys_agent a INNER JOIN ${tableName} b USING (F_GAME_ID)
(
( F_GAME_ID = #{params.superAgentGameId} AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE ) OR ( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID = #{params.superAgentGameId} AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS FALSE )
F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE OR ( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID IS NOT NULL AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS FALSE )
)
and convert(b.F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) >= convert(#{params.startDate}, DATE)
and convert(b.F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) <= convert(#{params.endDate}, DATE)

SELECT 't2' as teamNo, '二级团队' as teamName, IFNULL(sum(F_PAY_PRICE), 0) as payPrice, IFNULL(sum(F_CARD_GOLD), 0) as cardGold, IFNULL(sum(F_PAY_PRICE) * #{params.t2}, 0) as commission FROM t_sys_agent a INNER JOIN ${tableName} b USING (F_GAME_ID)
(
( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID = #{params.superAgentGameId} AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE ) or ( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID in ( select F_GAME_ID from t_sys_agent where F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID = #{params.superAgentGameId} AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE ) and F_IS_AUTHORIZED is false )
( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID IS NOT NULL AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE ) or ( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID in ( select F_GAME_ID from t_sys_agent where F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID IS NOT NULL AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE ) and F_IS_AUTHORIZED is false )
)
and convert(b.F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) >= convert(#{params.startDate}, DATE)
and convert(b.F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) <= convert(#{params.endDate}, DATE)

SELECT 't3' as teamNo, '三级团队' as teamName, IFNULL(sum(F_PAY_PRICE), 0) as payPrice, IFNULL(sum(F_CARD_GOLD), 0) as cardGold, IFNULL(sum(F_PAY_PRICE) * #{params.t3}, 0) as commission FROM t_sys_agent a INNER JOIN ${tableName} b USING (F_GAME_ID)
( ( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID in ( select F_GAME_ID from t_sys_agent where
F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID = #{params.superAgentGameId}
F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID IS NOT NULL
and F_IS_AUTHORIZED is true ) AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE ) or ( F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID in ( select F_GAME_ID from t_sys_agent where F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID in ( select F_GAME_ID from t_sys_agent where
F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID = #{params.superAgentGameId}
F_SUPER_AGENT_GAME_ID IS NOT NULL
and F_IS_AUTHORIZED is true ) AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS TRUE ) AND F_IS_AUTHORIZED IS false ) )
and convert(b.F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) >= convert(#{params.startDate}, DATE)
and convert(b.F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) <= convert(#{params.endDate}, DATE)
